about: Welcome to my website! I'm Derek Pesa, a passionate software developer based in Nairobi, Kenya, currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science degree in Software Development at KCA University. With a strong technical foundation and expertise in JavaScript, Node.js, and React, I bring a unique perspective to every project.#Throughout my academic journey at KCA University, I have gained comprehensive knowledge in software development principles, algorithms, data structures, and software engineering practices. This educational background, combined with my hands-on experience, allows me to excel in developing robust and scalable applications using Node.js and creating dynamic user interfaces with React.#Proficient in JavaScript, Node.js, and React, I have successfully delivered a variety of projects, including full-stack web applications and responsive single-page websites. I consistently leverage these technologies to deliver exceptional results and create seamless user experiences.#As a software developer, I am dedicated to creating meaningful and impactful solutions. I firmly believe that technology has the power to shape the world, and I am committed to leveraging my skills to make a positive difference. With a keen eye for detail, a passion for innovation, and the knowledge gained from my ongoing education, I strive to build applications that meet functional requirements and exceed expectations.#Thank you for visiting my website, and I look forward to connecting with you soon!#Sincerely, Derek Pesa
